Class: ImageTool

DrawerJs.plugins.ImageTool(drawerInstance, options)

new ImageTool(drawerInstance, options)

Tool to add and upload image to canvas.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
drawerInstance DrawerJs.Drawer Instance of DrawerJs.Drawer.
options Object Configuration object.
Properties
Name Type Attributes Default Description
maxImageSizeKb String <optional>
 '5120' Max size of image to upload in KB. Default is 5 MB;

If null, or 0 is set - then size is unlimited. Negative values are considered as 0;
scaleDownLargeImage Boolean <optional>
 true If set to true - images. larger then canvas, will be scaled down
acceptedMIMETypes Array.<String> <optional>
 ['image/jpeg', 'image/png', 'image/gif'] If set to true - images. larger then canvas, will be scaled down

  • plugins/shape-image/ImageShape.js, line 26
